entities.name: dragon
entities.description: The dragon is mentioned as being past by Harry and the other champions. It roars loudly, indicating its presence.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is a champion who has been given a task to complete. He is mentioned as leaving the tent and talking with Ron.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and fellow champion. He is mentioned as being talked to by Harry.

entities.name: golden eggs
entities.description: The golden eggs are objects that the champions have been given. They contain a clue that will help them complete their second task.

entities.name: clue
entities.description: The clue is inside the golden egg and will tell the champions what their second task is.

entities.name: second task
entities.description: The second task is a challenge that the champions must complete. It takes place at half past nine on February 24th.

entities.name: February 24th
entities.description: This is the date when the second task will take place.

entities.name: witch
entities.description: A witch leaps out from behind a clump of trees, surprising Harry and Ron.

relationships.description: Harry has passed by the dragon, which is mentioned as being present in the forest.
Ron is Harry's friend and fellow champion. They are talking to each other as they walk back around the edge of the forest.
Harry has been given a golden egg, which contains a clue that will help him complete his second task.
The clue inside the golden egg describes what the second task is and how to prepare for it.
